SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Kelsey Cavaliere’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope schools exist where learning and laughter are heard from the hallways…”

– Mrs. Kelsey Cavaliere, Third Grade Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/schools-learning-laughter-heard-from-hallways/
